contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Quarna Sopra | official_name = Comune di Quarna Sopra | native_name = | image_skyline = QuarnaSopra parrocchiale.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 52 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 8 |longm = 22 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(302)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Piedmont]] | province = [[Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola]] (VB) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 9.5 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 302 | population_as_of = Dec. 2004 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Quarnesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 860 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 28020 | area_code = 0323 | website = {{official website|http://www.comune.quarnasopra.vb.it}} | footnotes = }} '''Quarna Sopra''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Piedmont]], located about 100 km northeast of [[Turin]] and about 15 km southwest of [[Verbania]]. As of 31 December 2004, it had a population of 302 and an area of 9.5 kmÂ².<ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].</ref> Quarna Sopra borders the following municipalities: [[Germagno]], [[Loreglia]], [[Omegna]], [[Quarna Sotto]], [[Valstrona]]. == Demographic evolution == <timeline> Colors=
